**Government Tender Announcement:**

# Remotely Operated Underwater Vehicle (ROV) - Request for Proposal

## Reference and Solicitation Information

*   **Contract Number:** F1007-220015
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3548384296
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Posting Date:** 2022-08-25
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-14T14:00:00
*   **Modified Date:** 2022-08-26

## Project Overview

The Government of Canada's Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of a Remotely Operated Underwater Vehicle (ROV) with autonomous capabilities. 

## Terms and Conditions

The RFP is open to all qualified proponents and will be evaluated using a best value approach. Theweets contractors are expected to submit a comprehensive proposal that addresses the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

## Mandatory Requirements

*   **Delivery Location:** British Columbia, Canada
*   **Contracted Completion Date:** August 31, 2023

## Bid Submission Instructions

Proponents are required to submit their proposals and supporting documentation electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.

## Important Notes

*   The Government reserves the right to reject any or all bids.
*   Bidders must ensure they have read, understood, and comply with the terms and conditions of the solicitation document.

The bidder must click on the provided link to access the full solicitation document, where detailed information on the RFP is available. 

[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13931884?extsite=MTM5MzE4ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13931884?extsite=MTM5MzE4ODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

For inquiries, please contact Jason Smith at jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
